updated README with:
How to use:
1) Launch iOS Simulator
2) Make sure the simulator's scale (Window | Scale) fits SimFinger. For retina devices, scale @ 50%. For non-retina, just use 100%
3) Launch SimFinger

Fixes
- Removed cursor from ever being shown (before, it was shown on the first click)
- Removed annoying popup, because of attempt to open simulator again.
- Added steps on how to use
Added SimFingerApp.zip
Added SimFinger.app file if anyone wants to download it directly
removing trying to launch simulator again, which causes errors

Fixed bug where cursor shows up after first click. Now, cursor stays hidden.
Changed hideThatCursor into a c function, to be called within the tap callback

Updated iOS Version Number and Fixed Simulator Positioning

iOS version number updated to the latest public version, and set the simulator position to correct vertical point, based off of screen size rather than fixed value (breaks on varying screen sizes).
Added iPhone 5 mode (portrait only)

Hide the cursor.

Uses this tip to do so: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/3885896/globally-hiding-cursor-from-background-app
Use non-obsolete runningApplication API to find the simulator properly.

Modernized project for Xcode 4.1.
Fix iPad simulator window in landscape mode.
Removed useless user files.
adjustment to work with "iOS simulator". Expects simulator to be set to iOS Version 4.0.2 and currently works with iPhone only.
